Commit.Log: Ignore % in URI to avoid escaping. Bug fix reported by Holger Floerke.
Moved fire of selection event into if().
Made static global XBooleans into instance members to solve thread-safety issues.
Changed UNKNOWN to UNKNOWN_ERR to avoid conflicts with UNKNOWN.
Changed UNKNOWN to UNKNOWN_ERR to avoid conflicts with UNKNOWN.
Removed code that was commented out.
Fixed bug where one too many characters was read.
Use vector instead of set for holding instances.

Commit.Log: Removed the sourceNode paramater from most element execution functions.
Re-initialized additional member variables in reset function.
No longer setting the current node in execute since it is already being done.
Removed bogus assert and changed default allocation sizes.
Fixed bug with recursive execution of pushParams().
Changed XalanDOMString parameter to pass by const reference, rather than by value.
Added constructor overloades for const char * and std ostream to allow implicit conversion of these types.
Changed call back to extern "C" to fix compiler problems for some UNIX platforms.
Added (c++) support for compiled stylesheets and stylesheet parameters.
Added (c++) support for compiled stylesheets and stylesheet parameters.
Removed XalanTransformer form link line and updated the dependencies.
Added (c) support for compiled stylesheets and stylesheet parameters.
Better implementation for TranscodeFromLocalCodePage. Changed DOMStringToDouble to use long conversion when possible.
Keep a pointer to string in the index, instead of an iterator into to deque.
Enabled caching of size and fixed a few bugs related to caching.
Pass text string to base class.
Removed dead code and re-structured code a bit.
Allow support classe instances to be changed.
Implement sort for xsl:sort lang attribute.

Make caching of sort results a compile time option, which is not enabled by default.
